cols.h5Detail:
one. Commodity introduction

1. This product is the finished account number and game activation code of tara ria steam. After purchasing, you will obtain the account number, password, bound mailbox, bound mailbox password and email address (the game activation code will be issued when purchasing cdk version). You can complete operations such as modifying the mailbox and changing the password by binding the mobile phone. In the above selected areas, there are spot orders can be assured.

2. The mailbox is a temporary mailbox. Please change the mailbox in time after delivery. Refunds are not supported once shipped (except for product issues).

3. All the account numbers sold are brand-new blank numbers, and there are no false account numbers.


II. Instructions for use

official website: https://store.steampowered.com/

steam account: the game has been purchased into this steam account, and you can download the game after logging in.

CDK: The game activation code can be exchanged for cdk after logging in to steam.


three. Precautions

1. After payment, you can view the purchased account information on the page where the purchase is completed, or you can click on the order center in the upper right corner to view the withdrawal, and the goods will be delivered automatically within 24 hours.

2. If the account is sold and deleted, the buyer will protect the account security by himself. We cannot retrieve the stolen account!

3. Please be sure to change the password when you get the account number. If there are other verification methods (mobile phone, email or secret protection), please also change them. If you have any questions, please directly query Baidu for answers and tutorials.

4. Refunds are not supported once virtual goods are shipped (except for secret accounts).

5. If you need a large number of wholesale can contact our online customer service, customer service will arrange to transfer people to contact you to discuss the price.

goodsDetail.tdkDetail:
